basics.name: Felix Nguyen
basics.label: Data-obsessed daydreamer
basics.summary: Felix is an aspiring product developer/customer researcher who knows a little of everything.

work.summary: Turn arbitrary requests from business stakeholders into fully working tools and applications. Create user stories, product roadmap, build data models, map new processes, devise application architectures, define wireframes/UI, write snippets of code, and run Usability testings. Make various innovations in CRM, Mobile App and Contact Center to improve Customer Experience.
highlights: Completed various Omnichannel initiatives to improve Call Center service level from 50% to 80%++.
Initiated and managed Chatbot product for CRM, achieved 500,000 daily users and saved more than $50,000 per month.
Lead the creation of new Mobile Wallet application, conduct intensive user research and feature development.

volunteer.summary: Ground up some sort of grasshopper mash for fishing.

awards.title: Beyond Excellence
awards.summary: Company-wide Creative Idea award for Messaging apps based CRM

publications.name: Radio Julius
publications.summary: Capitalize on low hanging fruit to identify a ballpark value added activity to beta test.

references.name: Nannette Nananacci
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Dugan Nash, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
